data.title: Pascale Bussieres Biography (1968-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

Louisa Burns-Bisogno to Jason Carter

Pascale Bussieres Biography (1968-)

Born June 27, 1968 (some sources say 1966), in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

Nationality

Canadian

Gender

Female

Occupation

Actress, screenwriter

Birth Details

June 27, 1968

Montreal, Quebec, Canada

Famous Works

CREDITS

Film Appearances

Chantal, Sonatine, Les Films Rene Malo, 1984

Le chemin de Damas, 1988

Laure, La vie fantome (also known as Phantom Life), 1992

Solange, Deux actrices (also known as Two Can Play), 1993

Rita, Eldorado, Alliance, 1995

Camille Baker, When Night Is Falling, October Films, 1995

Sarah, The Whole of the Moon, 1996

Narrator/Forest, La foret et le bucheron, 1996

Marguerite Volant, 1996

Les mille merveilles de l'univers, 1997

Juliana Kossel, Twilight of the Ice Nymphs, Zeitgeist Films, 1997

Guy Maddin: Waiting for Twilight (documentary), 1997

Louise, Honeymoon, Dove International, 1997

Simone Prevost, Un 32 aout sur terre (also known as August 32ndon Earth), Epicentre Films, 1998

Nathalie, L'age de braise (also known as When I Will Be Gone), 1998

L'homme invisible a la fenetre, 1998

Coeur au poing, 1998

Mere de Hanna, Emporte-moi (also known as Emporte-moi and Set Me Free), Artistic License, 1999

Gail, The Five Senses, Fine Line Features, 1999

Lucie, Souvenirs intimes (also known as Memories Unlocked),1999

Celine, Les filles ne savent pas nager (also known as Girls Can't Swim), Haut et Court, 1999

La beaute de Pandore, 2000

Lea, La bouteille (also known as The Battle), Lions Gate Films, Inc., 2000

X Change, Trimark Pictures, 2000

Between the Moon and Montevideo, Cinema Libre, 2000

Ma folle de soeur, 2001

Also appeared in Haut les mains and La femme de Pierre.

Television Appearances

Series

Chambres en ville, 1990

Blanche Pronovost (title role), Blanche, 1993

Valerie Morin, Paparazzi, 1997

Miniseries

Eleonore Volant, Marguerite Volant, 1996

Movies

Jenny Baker, Thunder Point (also known as Jack Higgins' Thunder Point), 1996

Michele Michaud, Platinum, 1997

Jenny Baker, Jack Higgins' The Windsor Protocol, 1998

WRITINGS

Screenplays

Eldorado, Alliance, 1995

Further Reference

OTHER SOURCES

Periodicals:

Maclean's, January 18, 1999, p. 59.

Toronto Sun, October 6, 1999 .
